CustomField.description: Calculates the number of days between when the opp first moved into a qualified stage (Pipeline) and the date to which it was moved to Closed (Won or Lost)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates the number of days between when the opp first moved into a qualified stage (Pipeline) and the date to which it was moved to Closed (Won or Lost)
CustomField.label: Total Pipeline Age
